<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:

EN:
[WhenUse] At 10+ Charge Count, consume all Charge Count to apply (Consumed Charge Count / 2) <sprite name="ChargeForceField"><color=#f8c200><u><link="ChargeForceField">Charge Barrier</color></link></u> (Rounded Down) to 2 allies with the lowest HP percentage
